parameters.description: Where in pagination to start listing abuse reports
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: How many abuse reports per page to list
parameters.name: per_page

parameters.description: A property to sort by, followed by the order (id, cdate, domain, type, status)
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: Filter by domain name related to the abuse report
parameters.name: domain

parameters.description: Returns reports created before the specified date
parameters.name: created_before

parameters.description: Returns reports created after the specified date
parameters.name: created_after

parameters.description: Filter by the status of the report.
parameters.name: status

schema.description: An enum value that represents the status of an abuse record

parameters.description: Filter by the type of the report.
parameters.name: type

parameters.description: Filter reports that have any mitigations in the given status.
parameters.name: mitigation_status

cdate.description: Creation date of report. Time in RFC 3339 format (https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc3339.html)

domain.description: Domain that relates to the report.

id.description: Public facing ID of abuse report, aka abuse_rand.

mitigation_summary.description: A summary of the mitigations related to this report.

accepted_url_count.description: How many of the reported URLs were confirmed as abusive.

external_host_notified.description: Whether the report has been forwarded to an external hosting provider.

in_review_count.description: How many mitigations are under review.

pending_count.description: How many mitigations are pending their effective date.

status.description: An enum value that represents the status of an abuse record

GET /accounts/{account_id}/abuse-reports.summary: List the abuse reports for a given account.

cdate.description: Creation date of report. Time in RFC 3339 format (https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc3339.html)

domain.description: Domain that relates to the report.

id.description: Public facing ID of abuse report, aka abuse_rand.

mitigation_summary.description: A summary of the mitigations related to this report.

accepted_url_count.description: How many of the reported URLs were confirmed as abusive.

external_host_notified.description: Whether the report has been forwarded to an external hosting provider.

in_review_count.description: How many mitigations are under review.

pending_count.description: How many mitigations are pending their effective date.

status.description: An enum value that represents the status of an abuse record

parameters.description: The report type to be submitted. Example: abuse_general
parameters.name: report_param

schema.description: The report type for submitted reports.

act.description: The report type for submitted reports.

comments.description: Any additional comments about the infringement not exceeding 2000 characters

company.description: Text not exceeding 100 characters. This field may be released by Cloudflare to third parties such as the Lumen Database (https://lumendatabase.org/).

email.description: A valid email of the abuse reporter. This field may be released by Cloudflare to third parties such as the Lumen Database (https://lumendatabase.org/).

email2.description: Should match the value provided in `email`

name.description: Text not exceeding 255 characters. This field may be released by Cloudflare to third parties such as the Lumen Database (https://lumendatabase.org/).

tele.description: Text not exceeding 20 characters. This field may be released by Cloudflare to third parties such as the Lumen Database (https://lumendatabase.org/).

urls.description: A list of valid URLs separated by ‘\n’ (new line character). The list of the URLs should not exceed 250 URLs. All URLs should have the same hostname. Each URL should be unique. This field may be released by Cloudflare to third parties such as the Lumen Database (https://lumendatabase.org/).

address1.description: Text not exceeding 100 characters. This field may be released by Cloudflare to third parties such as the Lumen Database (https://lumendatabase.org/).

agent_name.description: The name of the copyright holder. Text not exceeding 60 characters. This field may be released by Cloudflare to third parties such as the Lumen Database (https://lumendatabase.org/).

agree.description: Can be `0` for false or `1` for true. Must be value: 1 for DMCA reports

city.description: Text not exceeding 255 characters. This field may be released by Cloudflare to third parties such as the Lumen Database (https://lumendatabase.org/).

country.description: Text not exceeding 255 characters. This field may be released by Cloudflare to third parties such as the Lumen Database (https://lumendatabase.org/).

host_notification.description: Notification type based on the abuse type. NOTE: Copyright (DMCA) and Trademark reports cannot be anonymous.

original_work.description: Text not exceeding 255 characters. This field may be released by Cloudflare to third parties such as the Lumen Database (https://lumendatabase.org/).

owner_notification.description: Notification type based on the abuse type. NOTE: Copyright (DMCA) and Trademark reports cannot be anonymous.

signature.description: Required for DMCA reports, should be same as Name. An affirmation that all information in the report is true and accurate while agreeing to the policies of Cloudflare's abuse reports

state.description: Text not exceeding 255 characters. This field may be released by Cloudflare to third parties such as the Lumen Database (https://lumendatabase.org/).

destination_ips.description: A list of IP addresses separated by ‘\n’ (new line character). The list of destination IPs should not exceed 30 IP addresses. Each one of the IP addresses ought to be unique.

host_notification.description: Notification type based on the abuse type. NOTE: Copyright (DMCA) and Trademark reports cannot be anonymous.

justification.description: A detailed description of the infringement, including any necessary access details and the exact steps needed to view the content, not exceeding 5000 characters.

owner_notification.description: Notification type based on the abuse type. NOTE: Copyright (DMCA) and Trademark reports cannot be anonymous.

ports_protocols.description: A comma separated list of ports and protocols e.g. 80/TCP, 22/UDP. The total size of the field should not exceed 2000 characters. Each individual port/protocol should not exceed 100 characters. The list should not have more than 30 unique ports and protocols.

source_ips.description: A list of IP addresses separated by ‘\n’ (new line character). The list of source IPs should not exceed 30 IP addresses. Each one of the IP addresses ought to be unique.

Invalid URL (http://example.com/) Invalid URL Scheme (http or https) Missing hostname in url Missing a required field Could not determine encoding of field
Failed while reading from database Failed while writing to the database This service error will trigger an alert for Cloudflare engineers to investigate the cause resolve it.

Please pick one party to notify about this report
Must acknowledge that you are bound by 512(f), that you have a good faith belief about the material, and that you have the authority to act
Original Work section must be between 1 and 2000 characters
A URL contains a domain that is not active on Cloudflare

You have entered URLs that contain more than 1 unique hostname. A single report may only include 1 unique hostname (i.e, www.example.com). To report URLs related to another hostname (i.e. other.example.com) you'll need to file a separate report.
